casebody.data:
John L. SOILEAU, et al.
v.
CHURCHILL DOWNS LOUISIANA HORSERACING COMPANY, LLC, Churchill Down Louisiana Video Poker Company, LLC John Soileau, et al.
v.
Churchill Downs Louisiana Horseracing Company, LLC, Churchill Down Louisiana Video Poker Company, LLC NO. 2018-C-1349 Supreme Court of Louisiana. November 14, 2018

Denied.
